title: 天皇賞（春）の後に・輝き、眩く

text.jpText:
『天皇賞（春）』を勝利したメジロブライト。
だが既に次の目標を見据えており、その眩き
姿にメジロドーベルは憧れに近い感情を抱く。
text.enText:
After winning the Tennou-sho (Spring), Mejiro 
Bright has already set her sights on her next 
goal. However, she already has her sights set 
on her next goal, and her dazzling Mejiro 
Dobel has a feeling of longing for the 
dazzling figure of Mejiro Bright.

text.jpText:
ブライトのようになりたい。そう思った後、
メジロドーベルは、自分がこれまで『誰か』に
なることばかり考えていたことに気づく。
text.enText:
I want to be like Bright. After thinking 
this, Mejiro Dobel realizes that all she has 
ever thought about is becoming "someone else. 
After thinking this, Mejiro Dobel realizes 
that all she has ever thought about is 
becoming "someone.

text.jpText:
自分に自信がない故に誰かの後を追っていた。
しかし、真に輝く存在はみな、自分の力と
自分のやり方で輝く覚悟をしているのだ――
text.enText:
She was following someone else because she 
lacked self-confidence. But every truly 
shining being is ready to shine in their own 
power and their own way. and ready to shine 
in their own way.

text.jpText:
その気づきを得たメジロドーベルは、
“メジロの新たな栄光”になるために、
自分の弱さと向き合う覚悟をする。
text.enText:
With this realization, the white-tailed 
dauber is ready to face her own weakness in 
order to become the "new glory of the 
white-tailed dauber". to become "the new 
glory of Mejiro.

text.jpText:
『誰か』みたいになるためではない。全ては、
本当に強い“メジロドーベル”になるため！
再起をかけて『宝塚記念』を目指すのだった。
text.enText:
It is not to be like "someone else. It was 
all about becoming a truly strong "Mejiro 
Dobel. She was aiming for the "Takarazuka 
Kinen" to make a comeback.
